about.title: About Us
about.content: We are a leading fine art logistics company specializing in the transportation, storage, and handling of valuable artworks. Our team of experts ensures the safe delivery of your precious pieces.

article1.title: New Art Storage Facility
article1.excerpt: We are excited to announce the opening of our new state-of-the-art storage facility.

article2.title: International Expansion
article2.excerpt: Our services are now available in new international markets.

article3.title: Art Handling Workshop
article3.excerpt: Join our upcoming workshop on professional art handling techniques.
